Description: Video tour available upon request! Gorgeous 2bed/1bath with roof deck! Sunny open layout with living room/dining room. Completely modern throughout. Lovely kitchen with stainless steel appliances and beautiful cabinets. Laundry in the building.m Tons of natural sunlight. Elevator in building. Roof deck. No pets. Professionally managed building. Available July 1st. Steps to the B Green Line, C and D lines. Beacon St, tons of restaurants, shops and much more!
